message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're not being generous, but I'll take a bigger share this time!
Okay, Bob, let's be fair. I'm giving you a little more this time, but I'm still taking the lion's share.  Take it before it's too late!
I'm not falling for your 'fair' offer. I'll take a bigger share this time, but I'll still give you some.
Bob, we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway this time. Let's seal the deal!
Halfway is not good enough. I want more, but I'm willing to give you a bit more too.
Okay Bob, I'm giving you more this time, but you need to accept before we both lose a lot of money!  This is our last chance for a good deal!
I'm not going to let you get the better deal. It's 50/50 this time.
